title: MLS won't switch to fall/spring schedule before '27
content: MLS has announced that the league will explore a switch to its schedule that would align with the international soccer calendar as early as 2027 . MLS will also explore possible changes to the format of the regular season and playoffs .
author: Cesar Hernandez

title: South America proposes 64-team 2030 World Cup
content: the president of south american soccer's ruling body CONMEBOL made an official proposal on Thursday to expand the men's 2030 world cup from 32 teams to 64 .
author: Associated Press

title: Onana blunders cost Man United in draw at Lyon
content: two errors from goalkeeper André Onana helped Lyon claim a dramatic 2-2 draw in the first leg of their Europa League quarterfinal on friday .
author: Reuters

title: Mbappé lawyers have court seize €55m from PSG
content: null saturday, thursday, 9 p.m. e-mail: cnn.com .
author: Associated Press

title: Castellanos: 'Uncertainty' over travel ban 'scary'
content: Portland Thorns forward deyna Castellanos says she does not know when it will be safe for her to travel outside of the u.s.
author: Jeff Kassouf
